title: Liquid-Cooled Chiller
description: Schema for ASHRAE 205 annex RS0001: Liquid-Cooled Chiller

descriptions: Ratings and design points defined using IP unit version of the standard, 2015 edition[@AHRI5502015]
Ratings and design points defined using IP unit version of the standard, 2015 edition with Addendum 1[@AHRI550A12015]
Ratings and design points defined using IP unit version of the standard, 2018 edition[@AHRI5502018]
Ratings and design points defined using IP unit version of the standard, 2020 edition[@AHRI5502020]
Ratings and design points defined using SI unit version of the standard, 2015 edition[@AHRI5512015]
Ratings and design points defined using SI unit version of the standard, 2015 edition with Addendum 1[@AHRI551A12015]
Ratings and design points defined using SI unit version of the standard, 2018 edition[@AHRI5512018]
Ratings and design points defined using SI unit version of the standard, 2020 edition[@AHRI5512020]

description.description: Data group describing product and rating information

rating_ahri_550_590.description: Data group containing information relevant to products rated under AHRI 550/590

rating_ahri_551_591.description: Data group containing information relevant to products rated under AHRI 551/591

model_number.notes: Pattern shall match all model numbers that can be represented by the representation

nominal_voltage.notes: If the unit can operate at multiple voltages, the lower of the two shall be stated

nominal_frequency.notes: Power supply frequency for the intended region of installation

liquid_data_source.description: Source of the liquid properties data

refrigerant.notes: The string shall start with 'R-' and then include the refrigerant number designation conforming to ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 34-2019[@ASHRAE34]

hot_gas_bypass_installed.description: Indicates if a hot-gas bypass valve is installed on the chiller

test_standard_year.description: Year of the AHRI test standard

rating_source.notes: Used by data publisher to document methods (e.g., software and version) used to generate rating data

net_refrigerating_capacity.notes: The capacity of the evaporator available for cooling of the thermal load external to the chiller; calculated using only the sensible heat transfer

input_power.description: Combined power input of all components of the unit, including auxiliary power and excluding integral pumps

cop.description: Ratio of the net refrigerating capacity to the total input power at the rating conditions

part_load_value.description: Rated part-load efficiency on the basis of weighted operation at various partial load capacities

part_load_rating_points.description: The four measured data points used to calculate the part load rating value
part_load_rating_points.notes: The measured data for all 4 points used to calculate the IPLV or NPLV rating point

full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.description: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load design point rating condition
full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.description: Pressure difference across the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.notes: Evaporator pressure difference as defined in the rating standard

full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to evaporator heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design rating condition
full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the full load rating was measured

full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.description: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the condenser at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the condenser at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_differential_.description: Pressure difference across the condenser at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_liquid_differential_.notes: Condenser pressure difference as defined in the rating standard

full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to condenser heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the full load rating condition was measured

rating_recalculatable_from_performance_d.description: Whether this rating can be recalculated using the performance data in the representation
rating_recalculatable_from_performance_d.notes: True if the rating values in this table can be recalculated using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard

rating_recalculatable_explanation.description: An explanation of the value for `rating_recalculatable_from_performance_data`

input_power.description: Combined power input of all components of the unit, including auxiliary power and excluding integral pumps

evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger

evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the evaporator

evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the evaporator

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to evaporator heat exchanger fouling layer

condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger

condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the condenser

condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the condenser

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to condenser heat exchanger fouling layer

test_standard_year.description: Year of the AHRI test standard

rating_source.notes: Used by data publisher to document methods (e.g., software and version) used to generate rating data

net_refrigerating_capacity.notes: The capacity of the evaporator available for cooling of the thermal load external to the chiller; calculated using only the sensible heat transfer

input_power.description: Combined power input of all components of the unit, including auxiliary power and excluding integral pumps

cop.description: Ratio of the net refrigerating capacity to the total input power at the rating conditions

part_load_value.description: Rated part-load efficiency on the basis of weighted operation at various partial load capacities

part_load_rating_points.description: The four measured data points used to calculate the part load rating value
part_load_rating_points.notes: The measured data for all 4 points used to calculate the IPLV or NPLV rating point

full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.description: Evaporator liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_evaporator_liquid_volumetric_f.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_entering_tem.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_leaving_temp.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.description: Pressure difference across the evaporator at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_evaporator_liquid_differential.notes: Evaporator pressure difference as defined in the rating standard

full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to evaporator heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_evaporator_fouling_factor.notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the full rating was measured

full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.description: Condenser liquid volumetric flow rate at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_liquid_volumetric_fl.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger at full load rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_entering_temp.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the condenser at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_leaving_tempe.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the condenser at the full load design rating conditions

full_load_condenser_liquid_differential_.description: Pressure difference across the condenser at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_liquid_differential_.notes: Condenser pressure difference as defined in the rating standard

full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to condenser heat exchanger fouling layer at the full load design rating conditions
full_load_condenser_fouling_factor.notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the full rating was measured

rating_recalculatable_from_performance_d.description: Whether this rating can be recalculated using the performance data in the representation
rating_recalculatable_from_performance_d.notes: True if the rating values in this table can be recalculated using the performance data in the representation within the tolerance of the rating standard

rating_recalculatable_explanation.description: An explanation of the value for `rating_recalculatable_from_performance_data`

input_power.description: Combined power input of all components of the unit, including auxiliary power and excluding integral pumps

evaporator_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger

evaporator_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the evaporator

evaporator_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the evaporator

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to evaporator heat exchanger fouling layer

condenser_liquid_volumetric_flow_rate.notes: Density calculations shall be made at the inlet temperature of the heat exchanger

condenser_liquid_entering_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the entry flange of the condenser

condenser_liquid_leaving_temperature.description: Liquid temperature at the exit flange of the condenser

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to condenser heat exchanger fouling layer

notes: `LiquidMixture` specifies liquid constituents and their concentrations
Density shall be evaluated at the evaporator inlet liquid temperature
`LiquidMixture` specifies liquid constituents and their concentrations
Density shall be evaluated at the condenser inlet liquid temperature

evaporator_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer
notes: Evaporator fouling factor at which the performance map was created
May be different from the certification data supplied

condenser_fouling_factor.description: Factor of heat transfer inhibition due to heat exchanger fouling layer
notes: Condenser fouling factor at which the performance map was created
May be different from the certification data supplied

maximum_power.description: Maximum input power at which the chiller operates reliably and continuously

cycling_degradation_coefficient.description: Cycling degradation coefficient (C~D~) as described in AHRI 550/590 or AHRI 551/591
cycling_degradation_coefficient.notes: Used when the unit cycles to meet a setpoint

performance_map_cooling.description: Data group describing cooling performance over a range of conditions

grid_variables.description: Data group defining the grid variables for cooling performance

lookup_variables.description: Data group defining the lookup variables for cooling performance

compressor_sequence_number.description: Index indicating the relative capacity order of the compressor speed/stage expressed in order from lowest capacity (starting at 1) to highest capacity
notes: If `compressor_speed_control_type` is `DISCRETE`, sequence numbers shall be provided for each discrete stage of the compressor(s)
If `compressor_speed_control_type` is `CONTINUOUS`, sufficient sequence numbers shall be provided to capture the continuous operation of the compressor(s)

input_power.notes: All power consumed by the chiller, including controls, motors, variable speed drives, purge units, sump heaters, fans, etc.

net_evaporator_capacity.notes: The available cooling capacity of the evaporator to the thermal load calculated using only the sensible heat transfer

net_condenser_capacity.notes: The capacity of the condenser transferred to the condenser cooling stream using only the sensible heat transfer

oil_cooler_heat.description: Heat transferred to another liquid crossing the control volume boundary from the chiller oil cooler.
oil_cooler_heat.notes: Set as 0 if not present or if heat rejection is met by condenser

auxiliary_heat.description: Heat transferred to another liquid crossing the control volume boundary from the chiller auxiliaries (motor, motor controller, inverter drive, starter, etc).
auxiliary_heat.notes: Set as 0 if not present or if heat rejection is met by condenser

grid_variables.description: Data group defining the grid variables for standby performance

lookup_variables.description: Data group defining the lookup variables for standby performance

environment_dry_bulb_temperature.description: Dry bulb temperature of the air in the environment of the chiller

input_power.description: Total power consumed in standby operation
notes: Includes devices that cycle on and off (e.g., purge units and sump units) and devices that draw continuous power (e.g., fans and controls)
Expressed as a time averaged power consumption
